column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Drinks: We had to have the sangria of course! But here's the thing
column2: my hubby and I are one of few who don't like wine. But we really liked the sangria! We had half pitchers of the peach and black raspberry. I personally liked the black raspberry better but both were yummy. Just so you know how much you are going to need to get tipsy
column3: the half pitcher filled up all our cups (party of 4) and with about a cup and a half left to split among us. Two pitchers were good for us
column4: we didn't want to fill up too much on liquids!
